text: The Best Plan Is No Plan is a 2013 Hong Kong romantic comedy drama film directed by Patrick Kong. It was released on October 17. ==Cast== *Sammy Sum *Hanjin Tan *Justin Cheung *Shiga Lin *Angel Chiang *Jinny Ng *Elva Ni *Jacquelin Chong *Terence Siufay *Yao Meng *Hoi-Pang Lo *Siu Yam-yam *Bob Lam *Linah Matsuoka *Rainky Wai The Best Plan Is No Plan at HKMDB The Best Plan Is No Plan at chinesemov.com ==Reception== ===Box office=== By November 21, 2014, the film had earned ¥0.66 million at the Chinese box office. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2013 romantic comedy-drama films Category:Films directed by Patrick Kong Category:Hong Kong films Category:Hong Kong romantic comedy-drama films Category:2013 comedy films Category:2013 drama films
title: The Best Plan Is No Plan
